message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's designed to enhance your daily experience. I believe it's worth more than its value to you, so I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $150. I look forward to your consideration.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I am looking for something within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $100 for the product?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. While we aim to cater to all customer segments, I would like to propose an alternative at $125. This reflects a compromise that acknowledges your budget while still allowing us to fairly compensate for the value of our product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product. This offers a compromise between your value proposition and my budget constraints.
